meanings.definition: To remove or take off (as in a hat)
meanings.sent1: He doffs his hat before entering a building.
meanings.sent2: She always doffs her hat when she sees her elderly neighbor.
meanings.sent3: The magician doffs his hat and a rabbit pops out!
meanings.sent4: As the sun sets, the sky doffs its vibrant colors for a blanket of darkness.
meanings.sent5: The knight doffs his helmet, revealing a determined expression.

meanings.definition: To tip or remove one's hat as a gesture of respect or greeting
meanings.sent1: The gentleman doffs his hat to the lady passing by.
meanings.sent2: In old movies, characters often doff their hats when meeting someone.
meanings.sent3: The penguin doffs its tiny hat to the zoo visitors, causing giggles all around.
meanings.sent4: The trees doff their leaves in the autumn, creating a colorful carpet on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The student doffs his cap to the teacher before starting the presentation.
